profile.name: David S. Miller
profile.headline: Principal Software Engineer at Red Hat Inc. | Cloud Native, Open Source & Distributed Systems
profile.about: As a Principal Software Engineer at Red Hat, I specialize in building robust, scalable open-source solutions for cloud-native environments. With a strong background in distributed systems and a passion for contributing to the developer community, I leverage languages like Go and Python to drive innovation and solve complex technical challenges. I am committed to fostering collaboration and delivering high-quality software that empowers users and organizations.
